verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Some trust in chariots
and some in horses,
but we will remember the name of the LORD our God (2X)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Now I know the LORD saves His anointed;
He will hear him from his holy heaven
with the saving strength of his right hand
They are brought down and fallen
but we rise and stand upright, oh glory!

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines:
Ahora sé que Jehová guarda a su ungido;
lo oirá desde su santo cielo,
con la potencia salvadora de su diestra
Estos caen; mas nosotros nos levantamos, y estamos en pie bien firmes
